lastTransactionID.description: The ID of the most recent Transaction created for the Account

accountID.description: The ID of the Account the Transaction was created for.

requestID.description: The Request ID of the request which generated the transaction.

time.description: The date/time when the Transaction was created.

batchID.description: The ID of the "batch" that the Transaction belongs to. Transactions in the same batch are applied to the Account simultaneously.

userID.description: The ID of the user that initiated the creation of the Transaction.
